Chemisorption/desorption_of_gaseous_HCl_.Conditions: Exposed to an atmosphere of hydrochloric acid vapour in a sealed vessel
Observations: Color change from dark green to yellow within a few minutes

Formation_from_1.Conditions: Exposure of crystalline 1 to vapours of concentrated aqueous HCl (37%)
Observations: Color change from dark green to yellow

Release_of_HCl_gas.Conditions: Left to stand in air at room temperature
Observations: Color change from yellow to bright green

Formation_from_2.Conditions: Release of two equivalents of HCl gas from compound 2
Observations: Color change from yellow to bright green

Chemisorption_of_HCl_gas.Conditions: Subjected to an atmosphere of HCl vapour
